name: Classic Flowers
description:
Hand painted, ceramic piggy bank, with the <font color="#F250B9">Classic Flowers</font> design on one side.

Available in Small & Large.

Please leave personalization information (name, colors, etc.) in PayPal's 'Note to Seller' section or send to info@binksbanks.com. If not specified, the name/lettering will be painted in the color shown.

name: Custom Design
description:
Hand painted, ceramic piggy bank, with a <font color="#F250B9">Custom Design</font> of your choosing on one side. 

Please e-mail me at info@binksbanks.com PRIOR to ordering, to discuss specifics of your custom design. I will try to accommodate all requests to the best of my ability.

Available in Small & Large.

name: Second Side
description:
The base price for each piggy includes artwork on ONE side of the bank. 

If you would like BOTH sides painted, please add this option to your cart.
